sentences.sContent: ...all the blood and offal the butchers shove down in the gutters.
sentences.sCn: …屠夫们倒入下水道的所有血和杂碎。

synos.tran: 内脏；[环境]垃圾；碎屑；工业下脚

trans.tranCn: 碎屑, 残渣, 废弃物, 垃圾, (猪、牛、羊等屠宰后的)头, 尾, 下水
trans.tranOther: the inside parts of an animal, for example the heart, liver, and kidneys used as food
